required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Tolerability to HS-20004 With Titration Administration in Type 2 Diabetic Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Open-label, Non-randomized, Weekly-dose Titration Study to Assess the Tolerability to HS-20004 in Type 2 (Diabetes Mellitus) Diabetic Patients

brief_summary.textblock: This study is conducted in China. The aim of this trial is to assess the tolerability to HS-20004 with titration administration in type 2 diabetic patients.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Treatment Emergent Adverse Events(TEAEs)
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an maximum of 8 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Nausea and vomiting during titration
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an maximum of 8 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Change From Baseline in Body Weight at different dose steps
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an maximum of 8 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in plasma concentration of HS-20004 from baseline at different dose steps
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an maximum of 8 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in plasma concentration of glucose from baseline at different dose steps
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an maximum of 8 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in plasma concentration of insulin from baseline at different dose steps
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an maximum of 8 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in plasma concentration of glucagon from baseline at different dose steps
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an maximum of 8 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: The minimum dose of HS-20004 that could keep plasma glucose under 6.1 mmol/L in Type 2 Diabetic Patients
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an maximum of 8 weeks

arm_group.description: Weekly-dose titration from 0.04mg/day HS-20004 to the maximum tolerable dose or of the ultimate 0.18mg/day

facility.name: The Second Xiangya Hospital of Central South University
